AUw.caption: Default Provider
AUw.doc: Provide a RPC url for the NFT smart contract you are minting from is on. Mainnet example: https://main-light.eth.linkpool.io
AUw.name: default_provider

AUx.caption: Name
AUx.doc: The name of the NFT being minted.
AUx.name: name

AUy.caption: Description
AUy.doc: The description of the NFT being minted.
AUy.name: description

AUz.caption: Image
AUz.doc: The image of the NFT being minted.
AUz.name: image

AVA.caption: NFT Receiver
AVA.doc: The address of the wallet who can mint this NFT. If you want any address to be able to mint this NFT use: 0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000
AVA.name: nft_receiver

AVB.caption: Price
AVB.doc: The price the minter must pay in order to mint the NFT.
AVB.name: price

AVC.caption: Royalty Recipient
AVC.doc: The wallet that will receive the royalties generated from this NFT.
AVC.name: royalty_recipient

AVD.caption: Royalty Percentage
AVD.doc: The percentage of each secondary sale of this NFT that will be sent to the Royalty Recipient.
AVD.name: royalty_percentage

AVE.caption: Primary Sale Recipient
AVE.doc: The wallet that will receive the funds generated from the initial sale of this NFT.
AVE.name: primary_sale_recipient

AVF.caption: Currency Address
AVF.doc: The currency that the minter will be charged to mint the NFT. For the network native token use:  0xeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee
AVF.name: currency_address

AVG.caption: ERC-1155 NFT Contract Address
AVG.doc: The ERC-1155 NFT smart contract that this NFT will be minted from. Make sure your signing private key has minting permission on the NFT smart contract.
AVG.name: nft_contract_address

AVH.caption: Days Valid
AVH.doc: How many days will this signature be valid for.
AVH.name: days_valid

AVJ.caption: Quantity
AVJ.doc: The quantity of NFTs to mint.
AVJ.name: quantity
